original_text: They are darkened in their understanding and separated from the life of God because of the ignorance that is in them due to the hardening of their hearts.
korean_text: 그들의 총명이 어두워지고 그들 가운데 있는 무지함과 그들의 마음이 굳어짐으로 말미암아 하나님의 생명에서 떠나 있도다

sentences.original_text: They are darkened in their understanding
and separated from the life of God
because of the ignorance that is in them
due to the hardening of their hearts.
